html:
No more noise or silly “pop AI” advice on LinkedIn. Here’s a brief guide to taking a gentle dip into this new technology and forming your own perspective.

Hi design friends (and anyone else reading this to whom this may apply). Tired of hearing all the noise about AI? Or to be more specific on what I mean by noise, I guess I should ask: Are you tired of all the unhelpful hype-fuelled tech bro capitalist-spiked doom-and-gloom irrelevant and ignorant discussion going on about AI out there?

Please don’t stop reading here. This feeling is precisely why I want to share my thoughts on this topic.

I’m pretty tired of this style of discussion, too, you see. However, as a content designer who works on content and strategy for LLMs, AI is very much part of my daily life.

Does that mean I dislike my job? Not at all. I actually love working on AI-based projects, and I’m lucky to be in a company where we consciously try our best to approach things in the right way to create actual value for our customers. We don’t just do things for the sake of it, or for the hype. We spend our time untangling difficult problems spanning content design, engineering, and machine…
